nodes.text: The GalaxyGuard Mk. VII was a brand of shield boosters for spaceships manufactured by BvK Fleet Systems. Up to three GalaxyGuard Mk. VII boosters could be stacked to provide greater endurance and range for a ship's deflector shields. One such booster could be purchased on the remote planet of Tatooine at some point before the Boonta Eve Classic podrace in 32 BBY.
